attributes.action: Socialy accept Military Identification Cards, i.e. Pubs, bars, clubs, shops...
attributes.background:
Many soldiers in the UK are refused drinks, entry and service when providing a military ID : (MoD90).
I and many others will agree this is a legitimate form of ID. 
Please make the public aware of this and sign this petition, weather a serving soldier or civilian.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. Some companies do accept military ID as a form of identification, however this is at the discretion of individual companies. You could start a petition calling on the Government to promote military ID as an acceptable form of identification.
